text: ye log yaqeenan jhoothe hai (ai rasool) tum is (masjid) mein kabhee khade bhee na hona vah masjid jisakee buniyaad avval roz se parahezagaaree par rakhee gaee hai vah zaroor usakee jyaada haqadaar hai ki tum usamen khade hokar (namaaz padho kyonki) usamen vah log hain jo paak va paakeeza rahane ko pasand karate hain aur khuda bhee paak va paakeeza rahane vaalon ko dost rakhata hai
